name: 3dAFNItoRaw
author: AFNI Developers
description: Convert an AFNI brik file with multiple sub-briks to a raw file with each sub-brik voxel concatenated voxel-wise.

inputs.description: Input AFNI dataset with possible modifiers for sub-brick and sub-range selection.
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: Name of the output file (not an AFNI dataset prefix). Default is rawxyz.dat.
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Force floating point output. Floating point forced if any sub-brik scale factors not equal to 1.
inputs.name: Force Float Output
